item.title: Analyzing U.S. Storm Events: A Data-Driven Approach to Disaster Preparedness - Part 2
item.description: In this second part of our analysis, we address the key questions posed at the beginning of our investigation. By analyzing storm event data from 2014 to 2023, we uncovered several important insights that can inform disaster preparedness strategies.

item.title: Analyzing U.S. Storm Events: A Data-Driven Approach to Disaster Preparedness - Part 1
item.description:
Introduction

How can we prepare for storms before they hit? After completing the Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate, I wanted to dive into a real-world problem—analyzing U.S. storm events. By studying past storm data, we can uncover patterns that help improve disaster preparedness.

item.title: Billie
item.description: Hi, I’m Billie! I’m just a data enthusiast who enjoys exploring interesting case studies and sharing what I learn. I write about data-driven insights in a way that’s easy to understand, whether it’s related to product management or whatever piques my curiosity. My goal is to make data feel accessible to everyone, no matter where you’re starting from.
